section.title: Commercial IP Security Option (CIPSO)
section.t: The Commercial IP Security Option (CIPSO) label format specification is documented in . While this draft has expired a long time ago, it is the defacto standard for labeled networking. It is also documented in .

section.title: Common Architecture Label IPv6 Security Option (CALIPSO)
section.t: The Common Architecture Label IPv6 Security Option (CALIPSO) is a successor to CIPSO.

section.title: Flux Advanced Security Kernel (FLASK)
section.t: The Flux Advanced Security Kernel (FLASK) is an impelementation of an architecture to provide flexible support for security policies.
